name: My Little Goblin
description:
There once was a time where the little goblin refined shiny jewels so beautiful it put sliced bread to shame. Unfortunately his companions have left him. They grew greedy and sought after a mysterious burning ball that lay above the surface of rock. Such a silly thing that. How could there possibly be a surface to his home? He has tunnels going in, out up and down. never once did he encounter such a thing. And how could someone hang a burning ball in the sky anyway? the string would break and the fire would run out eventually... Little goblin thought this to be a very silly expedition. So he stayed behind. And now you, have found little goblin. Will you care for him?

This is my first unity project and I have only just learnt c# so I would like for people to test it and throw ideas at me for my next project which will hopefully be a full functional game. The "?" and status bar do not work and are there purely for decoration. Maybe I'll revisit it and add in those features.
